TopicTitle: Another episode of "Dumb Moments in KSP Installation History"

Articles.Content:
I'm setting up mods for a new playthrough. My usual routine is to install my infrastructure (planet pack, visual mods, contracts, etc.), launch KSP to test, then quit to add part packs.

So, I got the infrastructure installed. I expected the new-to-me planet pack to have glitches but that part was working. Contract Configurator, though, wouldn't show in the settings menu ... then I realized I was testing in sandbox mode.

 

Edit: And in a 2nd dumb moment, I posted this to the wrong subforum. It's not a Gameplay Question.

 

Edited August 11, 2021 by DeadJohn
